殬字的基本解释

殬
dù
古同“斁”，败坏：“彝伦攸殬。”

殬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dù］
［《廣韻》當故切，去暮，端。］
败坏；祸害。

殬字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殬； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页583第32
【唐韻】當故切【集韻】多故切，?音妒。【說文】敗也。【書·洪範】彝倫攸殬。○按今《書》本作斁。斁本有亦、妒二音，《正字通》同?，不同?，非。　又【劉勰·新論】小利，大利之殬。小?，大禍之津。　【集韻】或作?。亦省作睪。

殬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
殬字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Mourn
dù
Gu Tong "Yi", corrupted: "Yi Lun You Huo."
Mourn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dù］
["Guang Yun" cut the story when it was time, go to dusk, end. ]
Corrupt; scourge.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Bad Characters] 　殬; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 583 32
[Tang Yun] Cut it when it is [Jiyun] Cut it for a lot of reasons, and you are jealous. [Said the text] also defeated. 【Book·Hong Fan】Yi Lun Youchang. ○According to the present "Book" as a copy. The two sounds of Yun Ben Youyi and Jealousy are the same as "Zhengzitong", but different?, no.　[Liu Xie·New Theory] Small profit, great profit. Little?, a catastrophe.　【Jiyun】or make?. Also save as a test.
